name: The Cleanup (SuicidePotatoes)
description:
A man walks down the beach, stumbles into objects cast aside by others. He begins picking them up in an attempt to clean the beach. Little does he know that some objects hold secret powers.

This game was made as part of Global Game Jam 2021. See our jam page!

[Note: To improve performance, the game played in the browser has reduced graphical fidelity compared with the downloadable version.]
